Message.Text: Welcome to the server! This is a big landing page and is the first thing lots of people see. It should probably be included in the screening process as well.
Here is a link to this server so that invites can be monitored: https://discord.gg/2V5YRSa73u

**Rule 1: Be excellent** Don't be a shit
**Rule 2: Not hate speech** Description
**Rule 3: Dinner table talk** Description
**Rule 4: Stay on Topic** Description
**Rule 5: No NSFW** Disappointing I know
**Rule 6: Privacy** Description
**Rule 7: Privacy Part 2: The Sequel** Description
**Rule 8: Moderator Discretion** Good to have for fringe cases
**Breaking any of these rules could result in:** â€¢ A soft warning (a ping by a moderator and potential deletion of messages). â€¢ A temporary mute (At moderator discretion) â€¢ A temporary ban â€¢ A **permanent ban** depending on circumstances
